text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus praelaeticolor is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 6 to 8 centimetres (2.4 to 3.1 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus praelaeticolor grows on laurel-oak stumps. It has been found in Florida, in June.
